name: ReLinked
description:
ReLinked is a pixelated sovietpunk alternate universe game in which the Soviet Union made a breakthrough in science by studying psionic energy. Earth has been invaded by an extraterrestrial civilization and is defended by psionics - people with supernatural abilities. You will have to beat off waves of enemies and think through tactics to fight back.

Game Features:
- 30 skills;
- 12 types of weapons, both melee and ranged;
- construction;
- bossed;
- and waves of enemies!
